hints.content:
###Meaning of rounding

Which pair of ten thousands is $17{,}242$ between? Which ten thousand is closer?

Which pair of thousands is $17{,}242$ between? Which thousand is closer?

###Round to nearest $10{,}000$

![A number line with 10,000 on the left, a mark at the middle, and 20,000 on the right. The point 17,242 is between the middle and the right.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/48cbe6bb73988ee33c90661c71db12d0c3ee6b7b)

Is $\blueE{17{,}242}$ closer to $10{,}000$ or $20{,}000$?

$\blueE{17{,}242}$ is closer to $20{,}000$.

$\blueE{17{,}242}$ rounded to the nearest $10{,}000$ is $20{,}000$.

###Round to nearest $1{,}000$

![A number line with 17,000 on the left, a mark at the middle, and 18,000 on the right. The point 17,242 is between the left and the middle.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f4654d72f664ac1b6af3cff9293090d1f876c929)

Is $\blueE{17{,}242}$ closer to $17{,}000$ or $18{,}000$?

[[☃ explanation 1]]

options.explanation: The number line looks different because we zoomed in to look at the nearest thousands to ${17{,}242}$.
options.showPrompt: Why did the number line change?

hints.content:
$\blueE{17{,}242}$ is closer to $17{,}000$.

$\blueE{17{,}242}$ rounded to the nearest $1{,}000$ is $17{,}000$.

question.content:
**Round $17{,}242$ to each place value in the table.**  

Number | Nearest $10{,}000$ |  Nearest $1{,}000$ 
- | - | -
$17{,}242$ |  [[☃ dropdown 1]]   |   [[☃ dropdown 2]]
